Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2121 RDU CENTER DRIVE,SUITE 300, MORRISVILLE, North Carolina, 27560, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Extreme Networks provides software-driven networking services for enterprise customers. Its products include wired and wireless network infrastructure equipment and software for network management, policy, analytics, and access controls. It offers high-density Wi-Fi, centralized management, cloud-based network management, and application analytics capabilities. Roughly half of the firm's revenue is generated in the Americas, with the rest coming from Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia-Pacific.

value.name: John Abel
value.title: Senior Vice President & Chief Information Officer
